member.name: T:LoggingLib.Logging
member.summary: A Logging Lib

member.name: E:LoggingLib.Logging.LogEvent
member.summary: Every event will be published.

member.name: E:LoggingLib.Logging.Broadcast
member.summary: Only the log that is greater than or equal to the lowest importance will be published.

member.name: P:LoggingLib.Logging.Logger
member.summary: Root Logger.

member.name: M:LoggingLib.Logging.GetLogger(System.String)
member.summary: Get a new logger.
member.returns: Return a new logger with the name that is specified.

member.name: M:LoggingLib.Logging.GetLogger(System.String,LoggingLib.LogBasicConfig)
member.summary: Get a new logger.
member.returns: Return a new logger with the name that is specified.

member.name: M:LoggingLib.Logging.BasicConfig(LoggingLib.LogBasicConfig)
member.summary: Set the logger's config.

member.name: M:LoggingLib.Logging.Debug(System.String)
member.summary: Publish a log. Level is Debug.

member.name: M:LoggingLib.Logging.Info(System.String)
member.summary: Publish a log. Level is Info.

member.name: M:LoggingLib.Logging.Warn(System.String)
member.summary: Publish a log. Level is Warn.

member.name: M:LoggingLib.Logging.Error(System.String)
member.summary: Publish a log. Level is Error.

member.name: M:LoggingLib.Logging.Critical(System.String)
member.summary: Publish a log. Level is Critical.

member.name: P:LoggingLib.LogBasicConfig.Level
member.summary: Set the lowest importance level. Default level is Warn. Log that is greater than or equal to the lowest importance will be recorded.

member.name: P:LoggingLib.LogBasicConfig.FileName
member.summary:
Logging to a file. Relative path is allowed.
"logs\logfile.log" will be represented as "{AppPath}\logs\logfile.log"

member.name: P:LoggingLib.LogBasicConfig.Format
member.summary:
Specify the format of the log. There are several parameters can be used.
(level), (name), (lineno), (time), (message)
The number of lines will not be displayed if the log file output is not set.
(time) is a little special. Several parameters can be used with it.
(time:utc) (time:offset) (time:"params")
"params" format follows DateTime.ToString(). Suchlike (time:T). Default format is (level) (name): (message).

member.name: F:LoggingLib.LogLevel.Debug
member.summary: Detailed information, typically of interest only when diagnosing problems.

member.name: F:LoggingLib.LogLevel.Info
member.summary: Confirmation that things are working as expected.

member.name: F:LoggingLib.LogLevel.Warn
member.summary: An indication that something unexpected happened, or indicative of some problem in the near future. The software is still working as expected.

member.name: F:LoggingLib.LogLevel.Error
member.summary: Due to a more serious problem, the software has not been able to perform some function.

member.name: F:LoggingLib.LogLevel.Critical
member.summary: A serious error, indicating that the program itself may be unable to continue running.
